name: 江佩穎
objective:
This course introduces the application of Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) syntax and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). The course content includes:

Hypertext Markup Language
Cascading Style Sheets
JavaScript, an interpreted scripting language
HTML5 APIs syntax
CSS3 features
Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)
HTML5 Canvas Application Programming Interface (API)
WebGL for three-dimensional rendering
schedule:
Week1-3: Chapter1: Hypertext Markup Language
Week3-4: Chapter2: Cascading Style Sheets
Week5: Midterm Project
Week6-8: JavaScript, HTML Canvas
Week9-11: WebGL
Week11-15: Advanced Web programming topics
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments: 20 %
2 Midterm Exams : 20% each
Final Exam: 30%
Quiz and Attendance: 10%
Bonus: 0.5 point
consultation: send emails to peiyingc (學校 email)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
